seg-source.mrk: Drawings

trans-unit.source: In the Search box, enter Drawings, then choose the related link to open the Drawings page.

seg-source.mrk: In the Search box, enter Drawings, then choose the related link to open the Drawings page.

trans-unit.source: Drawings are the construction plans linked with the item. In Microsoft Dynamics NAV, these consist of four components:

seg-source.mrk: Drawings are the construction plans linked with the item.
In Microsoft Dynamics NAV, these consist of four components:
List of Drawings
Drawing Card

trans-unit.source: Link Drawings with Documents (in header and in lines)

seg-source.mrk: Link Drawings with Documents (in header and in lines)
History
List of Drawings

trans-unit.source: The drawing list is the overview of all drawings. If an item uses different drawings, all drawings are displayed in connection with the No. field to the Type Code field.

seg-source.mrk: The drawing list is the overview of all drawings.
If an item uses different drawings, all drawings are displayed in connection with the No.
field to the Type Code field.
: Drawings

trans-unit.source: The fields in the Drawings page are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the Drawings page are described in the following table.
Field
Description
No.
Number of drawing.
Type Code

trans-unit.source: Unique description of a drawing type.

seg-source.mrk: Unique description of a drawing type.
Revision Code

trans-unit.source: Displays the current revision of the drawing.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the current revision of the drawing.
Description
Brief description of the drawing.
Status Code

trans-unit.source: Displays the current status of the drawing.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the current status of the drawing.
Created from No.

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of the drawing from which the current status has emerged. This field is used to make revision statuses traceable.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of the drawing from which the current status has emerged.
This field is used to make revision statuses traceable.
Created from Revision Code

trans-unit.source: Displays the revision status of the drawing from which the current status has emerged. This field is used to make revision statuses traceable.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the revision status of the drawing from which the current status has emerged.
This field is used to make revision statuses traceable.
Note

trans-unit.source: It is possible to create a new revision status D from revision status A. B and C will then be outdated.

seg-source.mrk: It is possible to create a new revision status D from revision status A. B and C will then be outdated.

trans-unit.source: The drawing picture can be imported and exported normally. However, this is not handled the same as in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV. The differences are:

seg-source.mrk: The drawing picture can be imported and exported normally.
However, this is not handled the same as in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.
The differences are:

trans-unit.source: Saving a picture in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV – The respective picture is saved directly in the table of the item between the other fields.

seg-source.mrk: Saving a picture in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV – The respective picture is saved directly in the table of the item between the other fields.

trans-unit.source: Saving a picture in cc|product data management – The respective picture is regarded as a reference and retrieved from its storage structure.

seg-source.mrk: Saving a picture in cc|product data management – The respective picture is regarded as a reference and retrieved from its storage structure.

trans-unit.source: This means that the underlying storage structure in the drawings must not be changed. If this should happen, no more drawings are shown in picture form here.

seg-source.mrk: This means that the underlying storage structure in the drawings must not be changed.
If this should happen, no more drawings are shown in picture form here.
Drawing Card

trans-unit.source: The fields in the Drawing Card are used to specify each individual drawing.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the Drawing Card are used to specify each individual drawing.

trans-unit.source: Open the Drawing Card by selecting a data set in the drawing list and then choose Edit or View.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Drawing Card by selecting a data set in the drawing list and then choose Edit or View.
: Drawing Card
General FastTab

trans-unit.source: In this area the general drawing data is recorded, some of which can also be seen in the list. The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: In this area the general drawing data is recorded, some of which can also be seen in the list.
The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
No.
Number of drawing.
Type Code

trans-unit.source: Unique description of a drawing type.

seg-source.mrk: Unique description of a drawing type.
Revision Code

trans-unit.source: Displays the current revision of the drawing.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the current revision of the drawing.
Description
Brief description of the drawing.
Status Code

trans-unit.source: Displays the current status of the drawing.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the current status of the drawing.
Comment

trans-unit.source: An internal comment can be written for the drawing. This has no relevant effect on the further procedure.

seg-source.mrk: An internal comment can be written for the drawing.
This has no relevant effect on the further procedure.
History FastTab

trans-unit.source: All data regarding the last change is displayed on this tab. This makes it possible to trace exactly when a drawing was changed by whom at each revision status.

seg-source.mrk: All data regarding the last change is displayed on this tab.
This makes it possible to trace exactly when a drawing was changed by whom at each revision status.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
Created from No.

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of the drawing from which the current revision status has emerged.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of the drawing from which the current revision status has emerged.
Created from Revision Code

trans-unit.source: Displays the revision status of the drawing from which the current status has emerged.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the revision status of the drawing from which the current status has emerged.
Creation Date

trans-unit.source: Date on which the data record was created.

seg-source.mrk: Date on which the data record was created.
Created by User ID

trans-unit.source: User ID from the user list that created the record.

seg-source.mrk: User ID from the user list that created the record.
Last Date Modified

trans-unit.source: Date on which a change was made to the current record.

seg-source.mrk: Date on which a change was made to the current record.
Modified by User ID

trans-unit.source: User ID that last changed the record.

seg-source.mrk: User ID that last changed the record.
Link Drawings with Documents

trans-unit.source: Drawings are used in manufacturing to guide the assembly of parts to ensure that the correct drawing is used for a manufacturing part. Therefore, cc|product data management offers the ability to trace the currently used drawing status with links in the documents.

seg-source.mrk: Drawings are used in manufacturing to guide the assembly of parts to ensure that the correct drawing is used for a manufacturing part.
Therefore, cc|product data management offers the ability to trace the currently used drawing status with links in the documents.
: Production BOM

trans-unit.source: As shown in Fig. 3, the Drawing Set and Line Drawing Set FactBoxes show the drawing status of the header item and the status of the item in the line, respectively. These cc|product data management FactBoxes are available in many pages to provide immediate access to the drawing information. The Drawing Set FactBox shows the drawing status of the header item, and the Line Drawing Set FactBox shows the status of the item in the row.

seg-source.mrk: As shown in Fig. 3, the Drawing Set and Line Drawing Set FactBoxes show the drawing status of the header item and the status of the item in the line, respectively.
These cc|product data management FactBoxes are available in many pages to provide immediate access to the drawing information.
The Drawing Set FactBox shows the drawing status of the header item, and the Line Drawing Set FactBox shows the status of the item in the row.

trans-unit.source: In addition to this information, you always have the option of checking the components of an item on its drawing.

seg-source.mrk: In addition to this information, you always have the option of checking the components of an item on its drawing.
: Component of a Production Order
Note

trans-unit.source: If a component for an assembly of a production order contains a component whose status code is not valid, an error message is issued when you post or process the production BOM or any other document.

seg-source.mrk: If a component for an assembly of a production order contains a component whose status code is not valid, an error message is issued when you post or process the production BOM or any other document.

trans-unit.source: : Example of an Error Message when Using an Invalid Drawing

seg-source.mrk: : Example of an Error Message when Using an Invalid Drawing

trans-unit.source: Example: Assigning a Drawing Set to an Item

seg-source.mrk: Example: Assigning a Drawing Set to an Item

trans-unit.source: In this example, a new drawing is to be assigned to item 1001 “Touring Bicycle”. First a drawing is created. The corresponding item number is selected from the item master.

seg-source.mrk: In this example, a new drawing is to be assigned to item 1001 “Touring Bicycle”.
First a drawing is created.
The corresponding item number is selected from the item master.
: Create Drawing

trans-unit.source: The type of drawing is then selected in the Type Code field and a revision is assigned. The revision number is checked against the PDM Setup (see topic “Product Data Management Setup” on page 1). If a revision code is required, it is possible to assign it manually or automatically.

seg-source.mrk: The type of drawing is then selected in the Type Code field and a revision is assigned.

The revision number is checked against the PDM Setup (see topic <MadCap:xref href="Product Data Management Setup.htm#_Ref525036143" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Product Data Management Setup” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
If a revision code is required, it is possible to assign it manually or automatically.
: Assign Revision and Status Code

trans-unit.source: In addition, a drawing file can be assigned in the Links FactBox. Finally, a status is assigned to the drawing.

seg-source.mrk: In addition, a drawing file can be assigned in the Links FactBox.
Finally, a status is assigned to the drawing.
: Created Drawing

trans-unit.source: The created drawings are automatically assigned to the item if the Use in Item check box is selected for the status in the Drawing Status Setup page (see topic “Drawing Status” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: The created drawings are automatically assigned to the item if the Use in Item check box is selected for the status in the Drawing Status Setup page (see topic “Drawing Status” on page 1).
: Drawing Set for Item Card

trans-unit.source: Using the Drawings action on the Navigate tab, all drawings for the item can be displayed, regardless of whether they are valid or not.

seg-source.mrk: Using the Drawings action on the Navigate tab, all drawings for the item can be displayed, regardless of whether they are valid or not.
: Drawing List for an Item

trans-unit.source: To edit the current drawing set, choose Drawing Set on the Navigate tab.

seg-source.mrk: To edit the current drawing set, choose Drawing Set on the Navigate tab.
: Drawing Set for an Item
